mapper.select: SELECT * FROM message m WHERE m.id IN ( SELECT t.id FROM ( SELECT id, conversation_id, create_time FROM message WHERE from_id = #{userId} OR to_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC ) t GROUP BY t.conversation_id ) ORDER BY m.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET status = 1 WHERE to_id = #{userId} AND status = 0 AND conversation_id = #{conversationId}
